items.title: This nuclear stock is a one-stop shop to play the nuclear power resurgence, CLSA says
items.description: Cameco is a one-stop shop for investors to play the nuclear power resurgence, according to CLSA.

items.title: CoreWeave shares jump after it starts VC fund to invest in AI companies
items.description: The company, which itself is backed by Nvidia, is the latest example of a tech giant turning to the growing world of AI startups.
